plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_messages
plurals.item: Do you really want to delete the %1$d selected messages?
Do you really want to delete the selected message?

plurals.name: dialog_message_invite_group_members
plurals.item: The %1$d following contacts will be invited to join the group %2$s: %3$s.
%3$s will be invited to join the group %2$s.

plurals.name: dialog_message_remove_group_members
plurals.item: The %1$d following group members will be removed from %2$s: %3$s.
%3$s will be removed from the group %2$s.

plurals.name: invitation_status_description_group_created
plurals.item: All %1$d group members accepted the invitation from %2$s.

plurals.name: invitation_status_description_own_group_created
plurals.item: All %1$d group members accepted your invitation.
The other group member accepted your invitation.

plurals.name: toast_message_sending_failed_for_users
plurals.item: Failed to send message to %1$d recipients: %2$s. Will try again.
Failed to send message to %1$d recipient: %2$s. Will try again.
